category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 33 (Decision and Notification of Disciplinary Action)
contents: Article 33 (Decision and Notification of Disciplinary Action) ① If the committee decides on disciplinary action, the Athletic Association shall send a decision in the form of Appendix 3 regarding the confirmed disciplinary action to the person suspected of disciplinary action, the head of his or her organization, or the sports organization or member of the person suspected of disciplinary action. It must be sent to the city/provincial sports council, city/provincial office of education, and the victim (in case of rights infringement). Revised December 20, 2019, January 24, 2022. ② The disciplinary decision must specify the type of disciplinary action, the reason for disciplinary action, and the basis for disciplinary action (disciplinary standards under Articles 31 and 32 (1), etc.). However, when notifying the disciplinary action decided in the first instance, the deadline and method for applying for reconsideration must also be notified.
